General.Name: Picton Property Income Ltd
General.Description: Picton, established in 2005, is a UK REIT. It owns and actively manages a £761 million diversified UK commercial property portfolio, invested across 49 assets and with around 400 occupiers (as at 30 June 2023). Through an occupier focused, opportunity led approach to asset management, Picton aims to be one of the consistently best performing diversified UK focused property companies listed on the main market of the London Stock Exchange.
General.Address: Trafalgar Court, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 3QL

4.Name: Mr. Jay  Cable
4.Title: Sr. Director & Head of Asset Management
